title: 话说其他版主....
author: jacky1440
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jacky1440 于 2012-5-16 03:34 编辑 

Only English!One more thing!
!Free COINS!
=================================================================
Special: 其他版主都去哪了？？？
Went to the water???
I only saw Geludan，zcy.... I think
Who speak english will have prize~
I didn't see Rikky for almost 1 mouth or more than...

谁能翻这个有重奖~（￥Prize$ Random)NO G翻（Google）！！或别的...
On Monday I and my roommates Carlos and Dannie went down tothe beach to have breakfast. I eat pork, sausage, and fried egg, I like it verymuch and my friends too. When we finish our breakfast we went to ask teacherwhat we going to do today and they said that we are going to the cave to searchor learn. When we were going to the cave my head got hit to the rock and bloodis bleeding. And then we went inside the cave and we went up the mountain, wesaw beach from far over and many tree. After we went a place that have board toplay and we play more than 30 minutes. After is time for lunch and teachersasked which kind of sandwich you want and I want chicken salad sandwich. We arehaving lunch in a building that looks like a boat and some drink and banana and a pack or chip. While we are eating sandwich and other food we saw sea turtleand other animals. We went to a place that recycling stuff and after we finishwatching we head back to aquarium and we were do scavenger hunt at Aquarium. 5o’clock we went back to hotel to get shower and then we have lunch.我想没人会翻这个...如果发现错误加分日记...=================================================================

replies.author: skykun
replies.txt_content: 你确信你的英文不是小学水平吗？第一句逗号后面的语法就错了。。

我就先翻第一句吧：
周一,我和我的室友卡洛斯和丹妮走到海滩去吃早饭。

replies.author: jzys
replies.txt_content:
时态错误一堆，现在时就现在时，过去时就过去时

When we were going to the cave my head got hit to the rock （头击石？厉害！）and bloodis bleeding
When we went to the cave my head got hit by the rock and bloodis was bleeding(主语不清晰)

After is time for lunch and teachersasked which kind of sandwich you want and I want chicken salad sandwich
After that it was time for lunch and the teachers asked us which kind of sandwich we wanted. I wanted a chicken salad sandwich.

We arehaving lunch in a building that looks like a boat and （缺失主语）some drink and banana and a pack or chip

we were do scavenger hunt at Aquarium
wtf？dosen't make sense at all 

中文论坛发什么英文，”英文好“不到英文论坛混在这干嘛？？？
